title: Track fault causing delays on the East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东海岸线轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Jejak kerosakan menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் தடப் பிழை

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Fault is cleared between #OutramPark and #RafflesPlace, trains are now operating normally.
[EWL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between Outram Park and RafflesPlace on both bounds due to track fault at Tanjong Pagar.
